entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [MAUI] ListView rendering issues when binding the IsVisible property. #25221
  • Filter "Remarks" from Maui properties Intellisense #25220
  • MAUI Android ListView using ViewCell with cells with borders does not appear to wrap text when Label has LineBreakMode="WordWrap" #25219
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64][Loc].NET MAUI Multi-Project App template on "Create a new dialog" is not localized. #25218
  • [MAUI] Set the Resize attribute to “False” for MauiSplashScreen, it will keep previous SplashScreen’s app icon and icon background. #25217
  • [Loc] The description of template .NET MAUI Multi-Project App project is not localized #25216
  • [Loc] The string “Framework” is not localized when creating new maui application #25215
  • In VS2022 17.11 Preview 5.0, when creating multi-project solution, the solution file gets duplicated and the progress is shown indefinitely #25213
  • Inconsistent Debugging with MultiValueConverterExtension crash #25212
  • .NET MAUI how to render HTML in Label #25211
  • BindingContext is returning null #25210
  • Cannot use SetModalPresentationStyle in MAUI project #25209
  • Unable to load library libSkiaSharp #25208
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25207
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes transient errors in MainPage.xaml.cs #25206
  • .NET MAUI CollectionView Item is not read by screen readers #25204
  • Customizing-.NET-MAUI-Shell - when navigate next page #25202
  • Actionsheet maximum size has been hardcoded on windows, creating display issues #25200
  • [net9-rc2] Trim analysis warning IL2026 using XamlTypeResolver with Compiled Bindings #25199
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Add SeparatorTemplate to BindableLayout #25198
  • MAUI Create your app - not able to create and facing error XA1018 Specified AndroidManifest file does not exist #25196
  • [iOS] New CollectionViewHandler2 "swallows" attached properties #25195
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Background gradients don't work for some views #25193
  • CarouselView Loop="False" renders incorrectly items ( net8, net9 rc2) #25192
  • CollectionView ItemSizingStrategy:"MeasureFirstItem" renders labels incorrectly (.net8, .net9) #25191
    Backlog
  • Shell MenuItemTemplate Broken #25190
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Wrong Binding Source #25189

Closed

  • [MAUI] XA1018 Specified AndroidManifest file does not exist #25222
  • [Android] Invisible ImageButton Padding Broken #25201
  • Slow build -> deploy on iOS #14560
  • .AddCompatibilityRenderer() for old renderer using interface IVisualElementRenderer doesn't work in .NET MAUI #25148
  • Maui platform symbols still broken in Vstudio 2022 #24366
  • iOS can't select PDF - FilePicker #25051
  • Leak caused by activity indicator. #25012
  • Why is button event click not working inside AbsoluteLayout for Window #25063
  • WebView can not show whole page #10134
  • iOS: content page is showing flyout menu icon when back button is set to false in flyout pages app #12289
  • Default .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid App fails to run on Windows 11 with Visual Studio 17.11.2 #24795
  • A sample app stops working after the 1st run #23374

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    community ✨
  • [Backport] Fix Regression with iOS button resizing with text or image change #25214
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • [nuget-msi-convert] Support improved VS component IDs #25205
  • [housekeeping] Enable TSA upload #25203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Added a null check for setting BarBackgroundColor for a NavigationPage #25197
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, potential-regression
  • Background gradients fixes #25194
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

Merged

  • Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #24990
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA

Updated

  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨
  • Fix Regression with iOS button resizing with text or image change #25122
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button, .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [Testing] Add UITest Stepper actions #25130
    area-testing
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [android] Fallback to default icons in SearchHandler #25067
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Try build arcade net9 #25085
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed VisualState Update for CollectionView SelectedItem #25145
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS]Resolved Button Text Resets to Previous Value When Set to Empty String Programmatically. #25171
    community ✨
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    community ✨
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for the issue with Label text color when resetting from FormattedText. #25119
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Testing] More UITests extension methods using an IQuery as parameter #25177
    area-testing
  • Speed-up Border rendering by avoiding useless pass during size allocation #24844
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/perf
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [iOS] Changed UIImageRenderingMode for buttons #25107
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • [XC] Propagate x:DataType from parent scope to "standalone bindings" #25152
  • [XC] Fix support for x:TypeArguments on root node #25183
  • [XC] Fix passing message arguments to BuildException when logging warning as error #25151
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25184
